title.narrative: Environmental Protection Agency, Office of International and Tribal Affairs (OITA), Commitment to the Commission for Environmental Cooperation

description.narrative: Provides support to the CEC which facilitates collaboration and public participation to foster conservation, protection and enhancement of the North American environment for the benefit of present and future generations, in the context of increasing economic, trade, and social links among Canada, Mexico, and the United States.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date

person-name.narrative: Glen Cuscino and April Bullock; Ryan Boles

title.narrative: Environmental Protection Agency, Office of Land and Emergency Management (OLEM), Environmental Protection Agency, Office of Land and Emergency Management (OLEM), Support for Border 2025 Waste Policy Work Group

description.narrative: Provides funding that supports projects aimed at addressing key waste issues along the US-Mexico border in Region 6 that are in alignment with the Border 2025 Waste Policy Work Group co-chaired by ORCR/MRWMD. From the recent RFP, there are 4-5 projects, all from Mexico, that qualify for the $100K.

title.narrative: Environmental Protection Agency, Office of Land and Emergency Management (OLEM), Environmental Protection Agency, Office of Land and Emergency Management (OLEM), Support for Border 2025 Waste Policy Work Group

description.narrative: Provides funding that supports projects aimed at addressing key waste issues along the US-Mexico border in Region 9, particularly the Tijuana estuary region, that are in alignment with the Border 2025 Waste Policy Work Group co-chaired by ORCR/MRWMD. The R9 projects are taking place directly in Mexico. One in the City of Tijuana, Baja CA and one in Nogales, Sonora..Timeline of the two efforts being supported is initiating at the end of September 2022 with an implementation period of 12-15 months. .

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date

person-name.narrative: Glen Cuscino and April Bullock; Ryan Boles
